attributes.additional_details: This Petition is Against the petition of banning khat, it is popular in mainly east african countries but does not affect the human body to a state where he can not think straight, it is mainly a stimulant that helps the mind either focus and relax, or feel less tired for a few hours depending on how much khat you chew, it is a leaf that is a tradition for mainly the Yemeni and Somali community It comes from a leafy green plant of the same name. khat is used for when a student needs to concentrate and sit in the same place and revise for a few hours, it is also used by people as a drug that can make you relax when with other friends/ family.
